Positions
I offer a fully-funded PhD position within the NCN grant Data-enriched models of computation . Here are further details.
About me
I am a professor in the Automata theory group at the Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics, University of Warsaw.
My research areas are:
automata theory, concurrency theory, formal verification, systems biology.
Here is the blog on computation with atoms.
Contact
E-mail: sl at mimuw edu pl
